name: Slime Shepherd
description:
This game was made for a "Introduction to Electronic Games Development" class at University of São Paulo (USP) in 2019. It was made in a period of 3 months, with a group of 4 students.

You can find the source code and project at https://github.com/kori4r2/Slime-Shepherd.

Controls
  • "WASD" keys: move the character
  • Mouse: aim
  • Left Mouse Button: charge and shoot slimes. If held, will charge more slimes into the shot, which will be launched on button release.
  • Right Mouse Button: call slimes near mouse pointer. If the shepherd is charging the shot, it will be cancelled instead.
